title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\InputConfig
name: InputConfig
description:
The configuration of input data, including data type, location, etc.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.InputConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.text_metadata
params.description: Required for text import, as language code must be specified.

params.name: data.bigquery_source
params.description: Source located in BigQuery. You must specify this field if you are using this InputConfig in an [EvaluationJob][google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.EvaluationJob].

params.name: data.data_type
params.description: Required. Data type must be specifed when user tries to import data.

params.name: data.annotation_type
params.description: Optional. The type of annotation to be performed on this data. You must specify this field if you are using this InputConfig in an [EvaluationJob][google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.EvaluationJob].

params.name: data.classification_metadata
params.description: Optional. Metadata about annotations for the input. You must specify this field if you are using this InputConfig in an [EvaluationJob][google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.EvaluationJob] for a model version that performs classification.
